text: Brockhampton is a village and civil parish in Herefordshire, England. The village is close to the River Wye. It is 9 miles (14 kilometres) south-east of Hereford, 8 miles (13 kilometres) north of Ross-on-Wye and 10 miles (16 kilometres) south-west of Ledbury. Category:Civil parishes in Herefordshire Category:Villages in Herefordshire
title: Brockhampton-by-Ross
